Writer: W. Bruce Cameron (screenplay), Cathryn Michon (screenplay), Audrey Wells (screenplay), Maya Forbes (screenplay), Wallace Wolodarsky (screenplay), W. Bruce Cameron (based on the novel by)
Title: A Dog's Purpose
Actors: Josh Gad, Dennis Quaid, Peggy Lipton, Bryce Gheisar
Plot: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.
